TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 1635

barker_notes.barker_summary: J. H. Policy to public, April 28, 1827. Receipt for two notes. Commerce.
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 1635

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*J. H. Policy to public, April 28, 1827. Receipt for two notes. Commerce.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p*I *person_mentioned*Joseph H Polly Sheriff of *location_mentioned*Austin's Colony*/location_mentioned**/person_mentioned* do hereby Certify that I have this day recd from *person_mentioned*Stephen F. Austin*/person_mentioned* two notes one drawn by *person_mentioned*J H Bell*/person_mentioned* in favor of *person_mentioned*Mr James Gains*/person_mentioned* or order for forty eight dollars and 25 cts to be paid in hogs at the rate of the *location_mentioned*country*/location_mentioned* and dated *date_mentioned n="04-25-1827">25th April 1824*/date_mentioned*. and the other drawn by *person_mentioned*Wm W Little */person_mentioned*payable to *person_mentioned*J H. Bell*/person_mentioned* for sixty dollars to be discharged in a good young mule, should one Mule not discharge the debt the balance to be paid in Corn or Hogs at the choice of the holder the first of said Notes payable in *date_mentioned n="11-xx-1827">Novemr*/date_mentioned*" of the same year and the other in *date_mentioned n="10-xx-1827">October*/date_mentioned*—the said notes having been attached from the possession of said *person_mentioned*Austin */person_mentioned*as the *location_mentioned*property of *person_mentioned*James Gains*/person_mentioned* */location_mentioned*by an order of the *person_mentioned*Alcalde of the Dist of *location_mentioned*Sanfelipe de Austin*/location_mentioned**/person_mentioned* under date of *date_mentioned n="04-27-1827">24th April 1827*/date_mentioned* on the petition of *person_mentioned*Wm Prator*/person_mentioned*.*/p*
*p**location_mentioned*Sn Felipe de Austin*/location_mentioned**date_mentioned n="04-28-1827"> 28 April 1827 */date_mentioned* *person_mentioned*J H Polley. Const.*/person_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
